modName: Hubble Space Telescope Ultra Deep Field 4K
summary: The Hubble Ulta Deep Field from the Vast Universe in 4K
descriptionHtml:
This Mod will add the Hubble Ultra Deep Field to your Skyrim Nightsky. As we all know the Hubble Ultra Deep Field Shows Galaxys at nearly the Begining of our Universe and as we know the Universe has an Age of nearly 15 Billion Years. So these Galaxys are Billion LIghtyears away from our Planet Earth It is just a Beautiful Picture with all the different Colors. It just changes the Atmosphere of the Game when traveling in Skyrim at Night and will give you a Unique Gameplay Feeling. 
Feel free to Comment and feel free to Upload your Own Screenshots from this Mod.
I will soon Release a more higher Resolution like 8k as soon as I finish my work.
Now I hope you can enjoy your new Nightsky and I wish you all a Good Time.


How to Install:

Just drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Directory and Overwrite Files if asked, then you will see the Hubble Ultra Deep Field in your Skyrim Nightsky !
I have made this one by Request thats why I made this one Standalone.
It is also high Resolution 4096x4096 !


If you like Skyrim Galaxys and Nebulas you could also take a look at my other Skyrim Beautiful Galaxy and Nebula Mod Packs.





PLEASE ENDORSE ME IF YOU LIKE IT !




My other Mods here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32644




CREDITS TO spacetelescope.org FOR THIS BEAUTIFUL PICTURES FOR RELEASING THEM FOR PUBLIC USE !!!

CREDITS TO NEXUS NETWORKS ( I CANNOT THANK YOU ENOUGH ) FOR LETTING US ALL SHARE THIS AWESOME MODS !!!

CREDITS TO BETHESDA GAMES FOR RELEASING THIS TREMENDOUS GAME !!!



Thanks to all of you !

HXP
author: HXP
